game.name: Stellar Freight: Echoes of the Void
game.categories: Single-player, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take command of a freight ship traveling through deep space. Every jump brings danger, every decision matters. Manage your crew, upgrade your ship, trade, fight, and survive in a hostile galaxy where resources are scarce and every day could be your last.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take command of a freight ship traveling through deep space. Every jump brings danger, every decision matters. Manage your crew, upgrade your ship, trade, fight, and survive in a hostile galaxy where resources are scarce and every day could be your last.
